title: Western-style serif face for The Sorcerer and The White Snake
content:
I have the impression I once saw this one in some free fonts list. Does anyone know what typeface this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818194503im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sorcerer-And-The-White-Snake_type_3640.jpg)
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: It’s even called Bleeding Cowboys! :D Thanks. :)

Yves, does the underlying font look familiar to you? In fact there's even a font in the middle: Oklahoma. On top of that Séguin is making money off of this...

Read the DaFont comments for a glimpse into the Wild West...

hhp

BT,DT: [http://www.typophile.com/node/85071](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818194503/http:/www.typophile.com/node/85071 "http://www.typophile.com/node/85071")

~ 4.4 million and counting. Go after them, hpp!

Thank you for pointing out that thread.

hhp
